name: RGB (CoolLikeGoose)
description:
RGB - a game created in a week for a BrackeysGameJam.

It's a simple puzzle-platformer, where you take control of three cubes. For passing the level you need to merge all cubes and jump into the exit from the level.

This is my first game jam and I will be glad if you like this game.

All resources (images, music, programming) were created during the jam, by me.

You can check my Twitter if you want to see the stages of development. (https://twitter.com/CoolLikeGoose)
